content:
I'm glad you're considering Bernat and Lion Brand yarns! They're both excellent choices for beginners, and you can't go wrong with their quality and affordability.

And, ahah, I think we've had this conversation before! Yes, I'm familiar with the craft store on Main Street, and it sounds like you had a great time browsing through their aisles. It's always exciting to discover new craft stores and explore their selection of yarns and supplies. Did you end up finding any inspiring projects or yarns that caught your eye?

As a side note, I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or physical locations, but I'm always happy to chat with you about your crafting adventures and offer advice or recommendations!
